lines:
RAA

9 Peterborosh

Besioni mass

Dan 14,1918. 
Dear Dr. Steams

Teda

Imbracht

was

to de aur

should

haps you are meerested to 
know that t'ib 10 is de Chines 
new year, on Feb. gite, Pros 
norsda a. Reutes Besta 
is going to give a grand reception

e students s 
Borten in nonte Cambridge 
gave one last year and it 
peat mecers.

He Chinese war meirion in 
now in Town. I was over te bere 
Club Saturday for luncheon with itens 
and e enjoyed the spaces ven and 
Ar. Koo gane a ver

good speech, 
Nurrionduril leave this paren

have this Herer 
por Hartford here they will 
inspect the ammen ition ordered 
te chine

evenment.

resquare

embarrassed to

your 
last: letter that you 
shneder all the bean 
mecudung in ser reaching in 
weite a message. e per

er not

me

it wa

heme waiting for a belephone 
call after d'had told you Mat

cened be reached ahber Jochure 
I should be there were to apologine 
for cousin

you so much 
trouble and 9 hope it is not

laran
raw: RAA 9 Peterborosh Besioni mass Dan 14,1918. Dear Dr. Steams Teda Imbracht was to de aur should haps you are meerested to know that t'ib 10 is de Chines new year, on Feb. gite, Pros norsda a. Reutes Besta is going to give a grand reception e students s Borten in nonte Cambridge gave one last year and it peat mecers. He Chinese war meirion in now in Town. I was over te bere Club Saturday for luncheon with itens and e enjoyed the spaces ven and Ar. Koo gane a ver good speech, Nurrionduril leave this paren have this Herer por Hartford here they will inspect the ammen ition ordered te chine evenment. resquare embarrassed to your last: letter that you shneder all the bean mecudung in ser reaching in weite a message. e per er not me it wa heme waiting for a belephone call after d'had told you Mat cened be reached ahber Jochure I should be there were to apologine for cousin you so much trouble and 9 hope it is not laran

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter in which Kwan states that he will see Mrs. Lynde on the 26th, notes that the Wellesley celebration was a success and he would like to offer a similar event at Phillips Academy, including Abbot students. The Chinese New Year celebration for Boston Chinese students will be hosted by Prof. Norton A. Kent. News about the Chinese War Mission speakers: Dr. Koo gave a good speech.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
